bye_week_advantage.description: Road favorites vs divisional opponents after bye week
bye_week_advantage.source: VSiN NFL Post-Bye Week Betting Systems
bye_week_advantage.apply_when: team_off_bye AND opponent_not_off_bye AND is_road_favorite AND is_divisional

extreme_travel.description: Away team traveling >2000 miles with 3+ timezone change (West Coast to East Coast)
extreme_travel.source: TeamRankings NFL Travel Analysis & Sports Insights Research
extreme_travel.note: Since 2013, trend has reversed (59.2% ATS) as teams adjusted travel schedules and oddsmakers corrected

morning_body_clock.description: West Coast team playing 10am local time game on East Coast (1pm ET kickoff)
morning_body_clock.source: Sports Insights - Morning Body Clock Analysis

revenge_game.description: Team facing opponent that beat them earlier this season
revenge_game.note: Low confidence - no specific research backing, mainly narrative-driven

playoff_desperation.description: Playoff-bound team in must-win vs eliminated opponent
playoff_desperation.note: Moderate confidence - based on general observation, no specific ATS research backing

lookahead_spot.description: Team with huge rivalry/playoff game next week
lookahead_spot.note: Low-moderate confidence - narrative-driven, difficult to quantify

primetime_edge.description: West Coast team in primetime game on East Coast (8pm ET or later)
primetime_edge.note: West Coast teams perform better in prime time when traveling east

short_week_disadvantage.description: Road team on Thursday Night Football (short week + travel)
short_week_disadvantage.source: TeamRankings & Odds.com Thursday Night Football Trends
short_week_disadvantage.note: Recent trend favors road teams on TNF, contrary to expectation. Home teams 27-13-2 ATS (67.5%) in Weeks 9+

division_game_home.description: Home team in divisional matchup (familiarity advantage)
division_game_home.note: Low confidence - general observation, no specific ATS backing

home_after_bye_nonconference.description: Fade home teams coming off bye vs non-conference opponents
home_after_bye_nonconference.apply_when: opponent_off_bye AND is_home_team AND NOT is_conference_game
